Hasan_ibn_Ali_children.name: Hasan al-Muthanna
Hasan_ibn_Ali_children.notes: Married Fatimah bint Husayn (his cousin) and had several children, including Abdullah al-Kamil, Ibrahim, and Hasan.

Hasan_ibn_Ali_children.name: Zayd ibn Hasan
Hasan_ibn_Ali_children.notes: Had children, including Hasan and Muhammad.

Hasan_ibn_Ali_children.name: Umm al-Husayn
Hasan_ibn_Ali_children.notes: Little is known about her life.

Hasan_ibn_Ali_children.name: Abu Bakr ibn Hasan
Hasan_ibn_Ali_children.notes: Killed at the Battle of Karbala.

Hasan_ibn_Ali_children.name: Umar ibn Hasan
Hasan_ibn_Ali_children.notes: Killed at the Battle of Karbala.

Hasan_ibn_Ali_children.name: Abdullah ibn Hasan
Hasan_ibn_Ali_children.notes: Killed at the Battle of Karbala.

Hasan_ibn_Ali_children.name: Qasim ibn Hasan
Hasan_ibn_Ali_children.notes: Killed at the Battle of Karbala.
